short_summary: Removal of existing Armoury Exhaust Hood system at Joyceville Institution and installation of new system as per drawings and specifications supplied.
description: The Correctional Service Canada has a requirement to remove an existing Armoury Exhaust Hood system at Joyceville Institution and install a new system as per the drawings and specifications supplied. Objectives: To complete the removal and installation of the Armoury Exhaust Hoods as outlined by the Engineering Consultant in the provided drawings and specifications. Deliverables: - The Contractor must remove the existing Armoury Exhaust Hood and all redundant components and dispose of them off site in compliance with all current environmental regulations. - The Contractor must provide and install a new Armoury Exhaust Hood system, as per drawings and specifications provided by the Consulting Engineering firm. - The following Drawings apply to this requirement and will be available in phase 2 as separate documents: ...

full_summary:
### Armoury Exhaust Hoods - Invitation to Qualify
#### Reference Number: cb-302-8364317
#### Solicitation Number: 21450-25-4624169

#### Important Dates

* Publication Date: 2024-02-07
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-02-27 at 10:00:00 AM
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-04-08
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-07-31

#### Request for Tender Description
The Correctional Service Canada (CSC), Joyceville Institution, requires a contractor to remove an existing Armoury Exhaust Hood system and install a new one, as per provided drawings and specifications.

#### Deliverables

* Removal of the existing Armoury Exhaust Hood and all redundant components, with environmentally compliant disposal.
* Installation of a new Armoury Exhaust Hood system, in accordance with the designs and specifications provided.
* Installation of associated electrical and mechanical components, as per phased 2 documents.

#### Evaluation Criteria

Bids will be evaluated based on Lowest Price, Meeting Specifications and Qualification.

#### Conditions for Participation

* The contractor must meet the necessary requirements outlined in the solicitation documentation.
* No set-asides for Indigenous Suppliers apply to this procurement.
* This procurement does not include security requirements.
* The crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

#### Contact Information

* Robin Riha, Contracting Authority
  Phone: 613-328-9727
  Email: robin.riha@csc-scc.gc.ca
  Address: 445 Union Street, Kingston, ON K7L 4Y8

#### Additional Information
A copy of the solicitation document and associated documents are available on the Canada buys/tender opportunities website.

Note: This tender announcement is intended to solicit bids from interested suppliers for this specific project. Due to space limitations not all information included in the raw text have been migrated in this rewritten version.

Contact me if the above rendition meets your expectation and you would like me to do this every time such contractor provided background data arrives!
